column3: Latest;Koh Kong:------ On the afternoon of April 29
column5: a dead man was found on the sandy beach at Pakkleng
column7: Koh Kong province.------The dead man has not yet been identified
column8: but police say that he was murdered and dumped at sea.------ An murder investigation has been opened.------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/302514
